solution_line_template: Nedy can eat {crackers_per_day_mon_thu} x {num_days_mon_thu} = <<{crackers_per_day_mon_thu}*{num_days_mon_thu}={crackers_mon_thu}>>{crackers_mon_thu} crackers from Monday to Thursday.
He can eat {crackers_per_day_mon_thu} x {multiplier_friday} = <<{crackers_per_day_mon_thu}*{multiplier_friday}={crackers_friday}>>{crackers_friday} packs of crackers on Friday.
Therefore, Nedy ate {crackers_mon_thu} + {crackers_friday} = <<{crackers_mon_thu}+{crackers_friday}={total_crackers}>>{total_crackers} crackers in all.
